foreignData.text:

mainBoard.name: Blink of an Eye
mainBoard.originalText:
Kicker {1}{U} (You may pay an additional {1}{U} as you cast this spell.)
Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. If this spell was kicked, draw a card.

rulings.text: If the target nonland permanent is an illegal target by the time Blink of an Eye tries to resolve, the spell doesn't resolve. You won't draw a card if it was kicked.
If a card or token enters as a copy of a permanent, the new permanent isn't kicked, even if the original was.
If a spell's kicker cost was paid, the spell is "kicked."
If you copy a kicked spell on the stack, the copy is also kicked. If the copied spell is a permanent spell, the token the copy of that spell becomes when it enters is also kicked.
If you put a permanent with a kicker ability onto the battlefield without casting it, you can't kick it.
The kicker ability doesn't let you pay a kicker cost more than once.

To determine a spell's total cost, start with the mana cost (or an alternative cost if another card's effect allows you to pay one instead), add any cost increases (such as kicker), then apply any cost reductions. The spell's mana value remains unchanged, no matter what the total cost to cast it was.

mainBoard.text:

Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. If this spell was kicked, draw a card.

mainBoard.name: Gearseeker Serpent
mainBoard.originalText:
This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.
{5}{U}: Gearseeker Serpent can't be blocked this turn.

rulings.text: Once a player has announced that they are casting this spell, no player may take actions to try to change the number of artifacts its controller controls before the spell’s cost is locked in.
Once this creature has been blocked, activating its last ability won’t cause it to become unblocked.

The total cost to cast this spell is locked in before you pay that cost. For example, if you control three artifacts, including one you can sacrifice to add {C}, the total cost of Gearseeker Serpent is {2}{U}{U}. Then you can sacrifice the artifact when you activate mana abilities just before paying the cost.
This card’s first ability can’t reduce the total cost to cast the spell below {U}{U}.

mainBoard.originalText: When Eager Construct enters, each player may scry 1. (To scry 1, look at the top card of your library, then you may put that card on the bottom.)

rulings.text: If multiple players are instructed to scry at once, such as while resolving Eager Construct's triggered ability, those players each look at the top card of their library at the same time, then they choose in turn order whether to put those cards on the top or bottom of their library.

mainBoard.text: When this creature enters, each player may scry 1. (To scry 1, look at the top card of your library, then you may put that card on the bottom.)

mainBoard.flavorText: "The explorer who found it got a bad deal when he sold it. He merely got rich."

foreignData.flavorText: « L'explorateur qui l'a trouvé s'est fait avoir quand il l'a vendu. Il est juste devenu riche. »
foreignData.name: Prisme prophétique
foreignData.text:
Quand le Prisme prophétique arrive, piochez une carte.
{1}, {T} : Ajoutez un mana de la couleur de votre choix.

foreignData.flavorText: „Der Forscher, der es fand, wurde beim Verkauf übers Ohr gehauen. Er wurde nur reich."
foreignData.name: Prophetisches Prisma
foreignData.text:
Wenn das Prophetische Prisma ins Spiel kommt, ziehe eine Karte.
{1}, {T}: Erzeuge ein Mana einer beliebigen Farbe.

foreignData.flavorText: "L'esploratore che lo trovò fece un brutto affare quando lo vendette. Divenne solamente ricco."
foreignData.name: Prisma Profetico
foreignData.text:
Quando il Prisma Profetico entra, pesca una carta.
{1}, {T}: Aggiungi un mana di un qualsiasi colore.

foreignData.flavorText: 「これを見つけた探険家は、売り払ったときにひどい取り引きをしたな。単に裕福になっただけとは。」
foreignData.name: 予言のプリズム
foreignData.text:
予言のプリズムが戦場に出たとき、カード１枚を引く。
{1},{T}：好きな色１色のマナ１点を加える。

foreignData.flavorText: "El explorador que lo encontró no hizo un buen negocio al venderlo. Simplemente se hizo rico".
foreignData.name: Prisma profético
foreignData.text:
Cuando el Prisma profético entre, roba una carta.
{1}, {T}: Agrega un maná de cualquier color.

mainBoard.name: Prophetic Prism
mainBoard.originalText:
When Prophetic Prism enters, draw a card.
{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.
mainBoard.text:
When this artifact enters, draw a card.

mainBoard.flavorText:
"Our creations are more than mere things. They have life in them, little bits of ourselves."
—Saheeli Rai

foreignData.flavorText:
« Nos créations ne sont pas de simples objets. Nous leur insufflons la vie, une partie de nous-mêmes. »
—Saheeli Rai
foreignData.name: Concepteur de voltigeurs
foreignData.text: {4}, {T} : Créez un jeton de créature-artefact 1/1 incolore Mécanoptère avec le vol.

foreignData.flavorText:
„Unsere Geschöpfe sind mehr als nur Dinge. Ihnen wohnt Leben inne, ein kleiner Teil von uns selbst."
—Saheeli Rai
foreignData.name: Wirblermacher
foreignData.text: {4}, {T}: Erzeuge einen 1/1 farblosen Thopter-Artefaktkreaturenspielstein mit Flugfähigkeit.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Le nostre creazioni sono ben più di semplici oggetti. Sono infuse di vita, racchiudono frammenti di noi stessi."
—Saheeli Raji
foreignData.name: Creaturbinanti
foreignData.text: {4}, {T}: Crea una pedina creatura artefatto Tottero 1/1 incolore con volare.

foreignData.flavorText:
「私たちの創作は単なる物ではありません。そこには生命が、私たち自身の一部が宿っているのです。」
――サヒーリ・ライ

foreignData.text: {4},{T}：飛行を持つ無色の１/１の飛行機械・アーティファクト・クリーチャー・トークン１体を生成する。

foreignData.flavorText:
"Nuestras creaciones son más que simples objetos. Tienen vida propia, pequeños fragmentos de nosotros mismos".

mainBoard.flavorText: All the wonders of the natural world in one breathtaking microcosm.

foreignData.flavorText: Toutes les merveilles de la nature dans un microcosme à couper le souffle.
foreignData.name: Île prospère
foreignData.text:
L'Île prospère arrive engagée. Au moment où elle arrive, choisissez une couleur autre que le bleu.
{T} : Ajoutez {U} ou un mana de la couleur choisie.

foreignData.flavorText: Alle Wunder der natürlichen Welt in einem einzigen atemberaubenden Mikrokosmos.
foreignData.name: Gedeihende Insel
foreignData.text:
Die Gedeihende Insel kommt getappt ins Spiel. Sowie sie ins Spiel kommt, bestimme eine Farbe außer Blau.
{T}: Erzeuge {U} oder ein Mana der bestimmten Farbe.

foreignData.flavorText: Tutte le meraviglie della natura in un microcosmo mozzafiato.
foreignData.name: Isola Florida
foreignData.text:
L'Isola Florida entra TAPpata. Mentre entra, scegli un colore diverso dal blu.
{T}: Aggiungi {U} o un mana del colore scelto.

foreignData.flavorText: 自然界のあらゆる驚異がこの美しく小さな世界に詰まっている。
foreignData.name: 興隆する島嶼
foreignData.text:
興隆する島嶼はタップ状態で戦場に出る。これが戦場に出るに際し、青でない色１色を選ぶ。
{T}：{U}か、その選ばれた色のマナ１点を加える。

foreignData.flavorText: Todas las maravillas del mundo natural en un microcosmos asombroso.
foreignData.name: Islote floreciente
foreignData.text:
El Islote floreciente entra girado. En cuanto entre, elige un color que no sea azul.
{T}: Agrega {U} o un maná del color elegido.

mainBoard.name: Thriving Isle
mainBoard.originalText:
Thriving Isle enters tapped. As it enters, choose a color other than blue.
{T}: Add {U} or one mana of the chosen color.
